Package index

All functions

ASSESSMENT_PATTERNS
The fields concatenated in a Panorama data field about intervention
DEMOGRAPHIC_FIELDS
The fields in a Panorama csv that relate to personal and socioeconomic identity
FILE_PATTERNS
The fields concatenated in a Panorama csv's name
INTERVENTION_PATTERNS
The fields concatenated in a Panorama data field about intervention
NWEA_MAP_GROWTH_PATTERNS
The fields concatenated in a Panorama data ield about MAP growth.
as_captures()
Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions.
batch_import_raw_reports()
Parse the filenames of and import the data from multiple Panorama csv files
compile_student_demographics()
Join tables of individual student demographic data into a single one
connect_to_columns()
Join a table of context information to the columns table
count_skips()
Find the number of lines to skip in a text file of data
demographics_from_raw()
Pull individual student information from a table of raw school data
filenames_to_tibble()
Parse Panorama file names into their component fields.
import_raw_report()
Extract text from a csv-formatted student-level file output from Panorama

Title
read_panoramel_spreadsheet()
Read the pages of a spreadsheet into a list of data frames
student_info_table()
Create a one-student, one-field table for a single kind of demographic info

Tidy assessment data into long format
wrangle_assessment_scores()
Condense values that describe student scores into a single table

Title
wrangle_panorama_fields()
